title: Update aptos framework to v1.2
description: Update aptos token package to the version compiled from git hash cb4ba0a57c998c60cbab65af31a64875d2588ca5 at bytecode format v5. This will resolve AIP-2. See release note for details: https://github.com/aptos-labs/aptos-core/releases/tag/aptos-node-v1.2.4.
